value.0:
This rifle consists of little more than a single long barrel that was an amalgamation of a number of pipes and long metal parts. Its only distinct feature, in fact, was a carrying handle that protruded from the side of the weapon.

Unlike most commonly found rifles, these do not emit laser blasts. Mustafarian skin alone is enough to disperse the heat of most blaster bolts, and the addition of armor renders lasers totally useless against them. Their rifles instead discharge kinetic energy condensed into bolts.

A blaster is a ranged weapon that fires bursts of particle beam energy called blaster bolts from a replaceable power cell. The most commonly used weapon in the Galaxy, blasters' intense beams consisting of compacted high-energy particles and intense light can kill or paralyze their target, depending on their setting.
